title: Discover the SECRET Keywords Your Amazon KDP Competitors Don't Want You to Know

In this video, I did competitor research using Helium10. The tool I used within Helium10 is Cerebro which shows you all keywords for which the given book is ranking in Amazon. I used some filters to determine the low competition keywords that we can use to create the metadata for o
